page.title: 01HORWICH/LOSTOCK REVIEW
page.content:
There are two main types of land cover in this area. 1. Agricultural 2. Residential
The agricultural land lies on either side of the railway which runs from west to east across the block. Low lying farmland in the south of the block gradually gives way to hilly moorland in the north.
The residential areas lie to the northwest and southeast corners of the block. The residential area to the southeast is developing in particular around Lostock junction. The residential area to the northwest is older and more established. A sharp contrast exists between the post industrial population from the established housing and the more modern and affluent commuter areas.
